document_data.name: Pit of a Thousand Voices
document_data.mainbody: The '''Pit of a Thousand Voices''' was located within the fortress of [[Sarahin]] in the [[Haunted Lands]].{{cite book/Assassin Mountain/Holy Slayer Sourcebook|30-31}}
document_data.Description: Winding tunnels and caves were scattered throughout the pit.
document_data.Activities: The Pit of a Thousand Voices was reserved for [[holy slayer]]s who committed vile crimes against the doctrines of their order. Holy slayers brought here were lowered into the pit, where a sound like a group of baying hounds and wailing moans greeted them.
document_data.Inhabitants:
A [[gibbering mouther]] called [[Al-Bakbuk]] lived within the pit. It consumed anything lowered into the darkness, adding to its ghastly bulk.

A pack of [[ghoul]]s serving [[Akim al-Kalaas]] also lived within the pit, feeding on any scraps of flesh left by the gibbering mouther. The ghouls worshiped a [[living idol]] housed within one of the larger caverns.
